title: create a DOAP file
description:
when projects.apache.org first launched, Solr was still in incubation, and incubating projects were not permited to be listed.

now that we've graduated, we need a DOAP file to appera in the list of projects .. it should be included in our published www site (like those for the other Lucene subprojects)

we should make sure to add a task to the HowToRelease wiki on updating once it exists.



http://projects.apache.org/
http://projects.apache.org/create.html
http://lucene.apache.org/java/docs/doap.rdf

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:
yonik already took care of this...

http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/lucene/solr/trunk/site/doap.rdf
